description: Non material amendment to include the following:Amendments to the Floor-to-Floor HeightsOmission of Window TransomsAlternative Sawtooth Brick ArrangementAdditional 2x studio roomsAmendments to curtain wallsAmendments to curtain wall spandrel panelsAmendments to curtain wall glazing panelsAmendments to window glazing panelsAmendments to window glazingAmendments to roof top plantroom enclosureAmendments to podium parapet cappingAmendments to amenity terraces aluminium fasciaAmenity terrace door omittedLandscape amendmentsof Variation of Conditions application reference 23/3188 dated 25/04/2024 for Variation of Conditions 2 (development built in accordance with approved plans and/or documents), 4 (commercial floor space - Use Class E) and 31 (storey heights of building) of Full Planning Permission (ref. 22/2225 dated 3 May 2023),  for the Demolition of existing buildings and redevelopment of the site to provide purpose-built student bed spaces (Sui Generis) together with ancillary communal facilities, flexible non-residential floorspace (Use Class E), cycle parking, mechanical plant, landscaping, together with other associated works, subject to Deed of Agreement dated 3rd May 2023 under section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended (and subsequent Non-Material Amendment (ref. 23/2537).Subject to First Deed of Variation dated 25th April 2024 to the Deed of Agreement dated 3rd May 2023 under section 106 of Town and Country Planning Act, 1990, as amended
site_name: Ex Fairgate House, 390-400 High Road, Wembley, HA9 6AS
